duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with sourcing, screening, and scheduling interviews for candidates matching job descriptions.
Maintain accurate records on applicant status and provide timely responses to all applicants.
Assist in providing offer letters and initiating background screening process for selected candidates.
Support company-wide recruiting programs and driver recruiting initiatives.
Perform internet candidate data mining and utilize enterprise applicant tracking systems.
Communicate effectively with candidates, peers, managers, and leadership.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree from two-year college or technical school, or minimum one year related experience. Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience preferred.
